name: Maze Escape (itch) (Peyton Paul)
description:
One day, you wake up in a stone maze with no recollection of previous events.

To escape, you must find a way out; however, the door is locked. To unlock the door, find the four chests throughout the maze with a book contained in them.

Once all four are found and collected, make your way to the exit; however, be careful as dangerous stone enemies are located throughout the maze. 

Time to Escape the Maze!
